      Classes in com.cubeia.firebase.poker.pokerbots.server.controller that implement Controller 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CacheController
      The Cache controller takes incoming requests and places them on a distributed cache (JBoss TreeCache).
      class  LocalController
      The Local Controller implements the controller logic towards a local Bot handling.
      class  MockController
      Mock implementation to test and develop the Controller interface
